document.full_text: a man suspected of being the east coast rapist pleaded not guilty in connecticut on tuesday to charges stemming from an attack on one of twelve victims from virginia to new england linked to him by dna evidence.
document.title: suspected east coast rapist pleads not guilty
lines_and_colors: a man suspected of being the east coast rapist pleaded not guilty in connecticut on tuesday to charges stemming from an attack on one of twelve victims from virginia to new england linked to him by dna evidence.
